title: Sona Q Causing Lag

embed.description: Was playing a few games today over both my accounts and noticed that the games with Sona on the enemy team (never had one on mine) would have an insane frame drop for me whenever Sona used Q (i believe it was Q could have really been any of them too laggy to tell).

body: Posted this in the wrong section yesterday so here is a link to it as I do not feel like retyping it all
